I guess it is NTR, but that would require accepting fan-fiction as canon. It would be one thing if it was Yukana, but this is just a side character who loves him but he doesn't share the same feelings. Hell the show isn't even really a harem as even though there are lucky pervert moments Junichi has made it in no way unclear he loves Yukana. It is their right to pursue a guy already in a loving relationship, but that doesn't make it a harem.
